There are long discussions on the benefits of LaTeX over Word, but this statement from a (not too serious) [paper](http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~gelman/research/unpublished/zombies.pdf) of [Andrew Gelman](http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~gelman/) (a Professor of Statistics and Political Sciences at Columbia University) hits the spot: *"LaTeX is the better typesetting system."*
